test_message: Create a video consultation room for patient ID P12345 with Dr. Johnson (cardiologist)
expected_purpose: Independent - Generates Twilio video room tokens for consultations

connection_instructions.patient: Use the provided link and token to join the room. You will start in the waiting room until Dr. Johnson admits you.
connection_instructions.doctor: Use the provided link and token to join the room. You have moderator access to admit the patient and start the consultation.
